thread.title: Do you feel financially prepared for retirement?
thread.title_full: Do you feel financially prepared for retirement? - Telegraph

author: Eleanor Doughty
title: Do you feel financially prepared for retirement?
text: We all have our regrets â€“ some social, some emotional, some financial. A new survey of the over 50s, out this week, reveals the number one money mistake people claimed to have made. Not saving for retirement is the one thing that the over 50s around the world wish they had done more for. Photo: Alamy Over a third of respondents to a global survey conducted by the deVere Group said they wished they had saved more. Almost a third of those surveyed considered not managing their finances with the help of a professional to be a mistake. Further to that, just under a fifth of those surveyed felt that their biggest mistake was allowing their emotions to become too wrapped up in their investment decisions. But tell us: did you make the right financial decision for your retirement? Take our poll More on personal finance in retirement Photo: Alamy Do the sums and retire ten years early Six funds to pick for retirement income The new funds launched for pension freedom telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegoodlife
